snippet: Officials announced on Friday that Citizenship and Immigration Services would soon begin processing the applications, which will cost $465 each.
abstract: Obama administration says it will begin on Aug 15 to process applications from hundreds of thousands of young illegal immigrants expected to seek two-year deferrals of deportation.
lead_paragraph: Officials announced on Friday that Citizenship and Immigration Services would soon begin processing the applications, which will cost $465 each.

headline.seo: Young Immigrants Can File to Defer Deportation Aug. 15
headline.main: Young Immigrants Can File to Defer Deportation Aug. 15
headline.print_headline: Young Immigrants Can File To Defer Deportation Aug. 15
